content:
# The error indicates that we cannot insert iron ore into the furnace because it is not present in our inventory. 
# This suggests that the iron ore we had was already consumed during the smelting process.

# To continue, we need to gather more iron ore. Let's move to the nearest iron ore resource and harvest some more.

move_to(nearest(Resource.IronOre))  # Move to the nearest iron ore resource.
harvest_resource(nearest(Resource.IronOre), quantity=10)  # Harvest 10 iron ore.
print(f"Inventory after harvesting more iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the updated inventory.
